软件包 com.radius.server.util

This package contains helper classes for implementing Radius clients and servers.

请参见：
          描述

类摘要
RadiusClient This object represents a simple Radius client which communicates with a specified Radius server.
RadiusEndpoint This class stores information about a Radius endpoint.
RadiusServer Implements a simple Radius server.
RadiusUtil This class contains miscellaneous static utility functions.
 

异常摘要
RadiusException An exception which occurs on Radius protocol errors like invalid packets or malformed attributes.
 

软件包 com.radius.server.util 的描述

This package contains helper classes for implementing Radius clients and servers.

The class RadiusClient can be used to send Radius packets to a Radius server.

The class RadiusServer must be subclassed in order to implement a Radius server.
